flavor: You fell from grace and lived many lifetimes as a rakshasa. For some reason, a god intervened and lifted you from the darkness to give you another chance in the light. Your wickedness burned away, leaving you pure and whole once more. Who was the god? Why were you chosen? Did you go willingly? Personal Quests: Raise a shrine or temple to your benefactor deity; find another deva who is tortured as you once were and guide him or her back to the light; remove a tyrant from power.
name: Purified Soul
